metadata.synopsis: A boy and his family grow to love a wolf-dog raised to fight.

reviews: For fans of the whole B-movie scene who want to see what a director like Fulci can do with a film that is also G-rated this is a pretty terrific example of how it can be done.
These outlandish extremes of tone do, unquestionably, mean that the film is a bizarre experience. But it is not, overall, an unsatisfying one.
